member.name: IMFVideoSampleAllocatorNotifyEx.NotifyRelease
member.summary: Called when a video sample is returned to the allocator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFVideoSampleAllocatorNotifyEx.NotifyPrune
member.summary: Called when allocator samples are released for pruning by the allocator, or when the allocator is removed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
